title: Ice Cream Soup
description: When Pee-wee's friends come by to swim in the Playhouse pool, he makes a big bowl of ice cream soup for everyone! Secret Word: DOOR

title: Luau for Two
description: Pee-wee plays in an over-the-phone game show and wins. The prize for winning is a free Hawaiian dinner for two. Unfortunately, Pee-wee has no idea who to take with him to dinner.

title: Rainy Day
description: Pee-wee tries to entertain himself and his playhouse friends during a rainy day, by playing games, making hot chocolate, telling a ghost story, watching cartoons and even making prank phone calls, but eventually he suffers from "playhouse fever" before wishing away the rainy day.

title: Now You See Me, Now You Don't
description: Pee-wee puts on a magic show and as the grand finale, he makes himself disappear! But when he can't make himself reappear, it's up to Jambi the Genie to set things right.

title: Just Another Day
description: Cowboy Curtis shows Pee-wee how to square dance... and soon the entire Playhouse is dancing! Then Pee-wee shows Curtis how to pogo. Finally, everyone has a cowboy-style snack! Secret Word: BACK

title: The Restaurant
description: Pee-wee is the maitre d', waiter and cashier when playing restaurant. Captain Carl orders everything on the menu, only to learn that all they have are peanut butter and jelly sandwiches.

title: Ants in Your Pants
description: The ants escape from their ant farm, and soon, the entire Playhouse is so inundated with ants that Pee-wee decides to perform the Ants In Your Pants Dance.

title: Monster in the Playhouse
description: A giant one-eyed monster is on the loose and appears in the Playhouse, scaring everyone! But after Pee-wee makes the monster a snack and Jambi grants Pee-wee's wish to understand the monster, the whole gang has a new friend! They even play a game of golf.

title: The Gang's All Here
description: The Playhouse Gang introduces a new friend named Rusty and they all get secret names. Then everyone draws pictures of Pee-wee.

title: Open House
description: Pee-wee is in the process of completely renovating the Playhouse and he has to get his friends to beg him to help him. After the Playhouse is finished, the gang has a tea party and new neighbor Mrs. Rene introduces herself.

title: Puppy in the Playhouse
description: The secret word was "over." Cowntess shows home movies of her trip to Europe, a puppy shows up at the Playhouse and Pee-wee names him Aloyisious, Jambi is allergic to him. When Reba the mail lady shows up, they find out that Alouisious is really her lost puppy... they are reunited and Pee-wee shows us how to make "macaroni art" with a portrait of the puppy.

title: Store
description: Inside Magic Screen, Pee-wee and Cowboy Curtis get chased by a train! Then, at Herman's Department Store, Miss Yvonne and Cowboy Curtis decide to buy Chairry.

title: Pee-wee Catches a Cold
description: Poor Pee-wee overdoes it and comes down with a cold. Ricardo and Miss Yvonne learn what an impatient patient he really is! But after some time in bed and chicken soup, Pee-wee feels way better.

title: Why Wasn't I Invited?
description: Cowntess is having a birthday party and everyone else in the Playhouse has received an invitation. First his feelings are hurt, then he gets mad. Just when he is about to give Cowntess a "piece of his mind" Reba shows up with his invitation.

title: Tons of Fun
description: The secret word is "cool." Pee-wee lip-synchs to an old record, the Playhouse gang visit and they have a dance contest. Cowboy Curtis drops by with his guitar and sings a song to the Flowers. Miss Yvonne teaches everyone to clog dance, and Cowboy Curtis shows them how to make "Ice Cream Cake Pudding."

title: School
description: Schooltime has never been so fun when Pee-wee is the teacher! There are no tests and no homework! Then there are some thoughts on the future as Pee-wee and friends discuss what they want to be when they grow up.

title: Spring
description: The secret word is "begin." It's Spring - Cowboy Curtis stops by and he and Pee-wee plant a seed and watch it grow. The King of Cartoons brings his wife (The Queen of Cartoons) and their new baby (The Prince of Cartoons) over and introduces them to Pee-wee.

title: Playhouse in Outer Space
description: The entire Playhouse is carried off into outer space to an alien planet, where they meet Zyzzybalubah, a lonely alien who brought the Playhouse to his planet so he can have friends to play with.

title: Pajama Party
description: Pee-wee is hosting a pajama party sleepover at the Playhouse, but no one can sleep! After all the games and dancing, why not stay up all night?

title: Reba Eats and Pterri Runs
description: When Pee-wee wants a letter mailed, he has Jambi make Reba appear right inside the Playhouse! Because it's her day off, Pee-wee makes her breakfast... with imaginary food! Later, Pterri feels unwanted and runs away from home. Secret Word: NOW.

title: To Tell the Tooth
description: Pee-wee has a doozy of a toothache, but refuses to go to the dentist. But when he finally does, he finds out that it was worth it.

title: Dr. Pee-wee and the Del Rubios
description: Reba has a splinter on her finger and so Pee-wee plays doctor to remove it. Then the Del Rubio Triplets visit the Playhouse. Secret Word: WELL

title: Fire in the Playhouse
description: Randy accidentally starts a fire when he raises the temperature on the oven too high. And there's more heat when Miss Yvonne meets Fireman Frank.

title: Sick? Did Somebody Say Sick?
description: Jambi the Genie isn't feeling so good. So Pee-wee calls a wish doctor. When Dr. Jinga-Janga arrives, he diagnoses that Jambi is suffering from Mecca Lecca Hinyitis.

title: Chairry Tee Drive
description: In trying to find the Countess' missing pencil sharpener, Pee-wee stumbles upon stuff he doesn't use anymore. So he decides to collect things to give to charity.. . and everyone pitches in! Secret Word: WAIT

title: I Remember Curtis
description: Pee-wee reminisces on the good times with his friend, Cowboy Curtis, including Curtis showed him his fantastic rope tricks and when Pee-wee and the Countess gave Curtis some tips on dating. Secret Word: REMEMBER

title: Conky's Breakdown
description: In trying to fix his favorite robot, Pee-wee accidentally rips Conky to pieces... all over the Playhouse! Now it's up to the authorized repairman to put Conky back together again. Secret Word: GREAT

title: Mystery
description: When some of Pee-wee's favorite items turn up missing, he vows to find the culprit.

title: Front Page Pee-wee
description: The Playhouse is putting out its own newspaper and everyone in to help. But when Randy cunningly changes everything to lies, all bets are off.

title: Playhouse Day
description: Pee-wee decides to start a new holiday called "Playhouse Day". So the gang puts together numerous decorations and traditions to turn Playhouse Day into a one-of-a-kind special celebration.

title: Accidental Playhouse
description: Oki Doki, a Japanese pen pal of Pee-wee's, arrives at the Playhouse and introduces him to sushi, origami (Japanese paper-folding art) and the movie monster, Gamera.

title: Camping Out
description: Pee-wee leaves Mrs. Rene to house-sit the Playhouse while he goes camping with Cowboy Curtis. They ride horses, roast wieners and sleep under the stars. Pee-wee thinks Curtis is lucky to be a cowboy! Secret Word: SHOW

title: Something to Do
description: Pee-wee makes a big "to do" list, which includes blowing big bubbles, dressing up as a pirate and going for a walk with Miss Yvonne. But then there's cleaning up his room... Secret Word: DO

title: Playhouse for Sale
description: There's a "for sale" sign in the window--is Pee-wee selling the playhouse?! What will happen to Puppetland??!! Can Miss Yvonne talk him out of it??
